title: Matchsafe, ""Otto Mönsted's Margarines"", 1894–95
markings: Illegable maker's mark (possibly W.J.D.), Birmingham anchor, date letter (u), and lion passant stamped on bezel. Lion passant and date letter (u) stamped on underside of lid. Lion passant stamped on link.
provenance: Collection of Carol B. Brener and Stephen W. Brener
creditline: Gift of Stephen W. Brener and Carol B. Brener
description: Oblong, rounded corners, overall incised scroll design. Central, oval reserve features polychrome enamel decoration with horizontal image of orange, black, and white striped tiger in crouching position, set against a background of green and brown tall grass and pink and blue sky. Reserve surrounded by a red band with inscription "Otto Mönsted's Margarines" in white letters. Elaborate, intertwined, incised monogram "SE" (?) in oval reserve on reverse. Link attached to top of lid. Lid hinged on left. Recessed striker on bottom.

tombstone.epitaph:
Matchsafe, ""Otto Mönsted's Margarines"", 1894–95.
1894–95. Silver, enamel. Gift of Stephen W. Brener and Carol B. Brener. 1978-146-10.
